DDSSubscriptionBuiltinTopicDataDataReader Class Reference
[Subscription Built-in Topic]

Declares IDL datareader < DDS_SubscriptionBuiltinTopicData > . More...

Inheritance diagram for DDSSubscriptionBuiltinTopicDataDataReader:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Declares IDL datareader < DDS_SubscriptionBuiltinTopicData > .

DDSDataReader of topic DDS_SUBSCRIPTION_TOPIC_NAME used for accessing DDS_SubscriptionBuiltinTopicData of the remote DDSDataReader and the associated DDSSubscriber.

Instantiates:
<<generic>> FooDataReader
See also:
